# UrbanKisan - Online Food Store

## Project Overview
MERN stack e-commerce website for organic food items with Tailwind CSS styling.

## Tech Stack
- **Frontend**: React 18 + Vite
- **Backend**: Node.js + Express.js
- **Database**: MongoDB
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS

## Color Palette
- Primary Background (Warm Ivory): #F4EFE6
- Gold Accent (Antique Gold): #C19A49
- Brand Green (Deep Olive): #5E6F52
- Text Brown (Rich Brown): #3A2C1F
- Section Highlight (Soft Wheat): #E8D8B8

## Project Structure
```
UrbanKisan/
├── client/          # React frontend
├── server/          # Express backend
└── .github/         # GitHub configuration
```

## Development Commands
- Frontend: `cd client && npm run dev`
- Backend: `cd server && npm run dev`

## Coding Guidelines
- Use functional components with hooks
- Follow RESTful API conventions
- Use Tailwind utility classes for styling
- Maintain consistent color scheme across components
